extends Object
implements DoorBuilding

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DoorBuilder(int maxDoorsPerRoom, int multipleDoorsOdd)
      DoorBuilder has methods for finding locations and placing doors to connect each room to the corridor network.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean connectsTwoSegments(int[][] map, Coordinates coords)
      Compares north and south squares and east and west squares, and returns true if both are non-wall and of different segment id.
      int[][] findAndPlaceDoors(int[][] map)
      Connects each room to the corridor network.
      Coordinates findConnectingWall(int[][] map, int roomId)
      Goes through the walls of a room in random order until one that connects the room to a different segment is found.
      int[][] placeDoor(int[][] map, Coordinates coords, int segmentId)

    • Constructor Detail

      • DoorBuilder

        public DoorBuilder(int maxDoorsPerRoom,
                   int multipleDoorsOdd)
        DoorBuilder has methods for finding locations and placing doors to connect each room to the corridor network.
        Parameters:
        maxDoorsPerRoom - each room can have up to this many doors
        multipleDoorsOdd - odds of adding a new door are 1/this
